text:
Alexa Chung SMOULDERS in lingerie for Love Advent

Alexa Chung was spotted in the JW Anderson FROW alongside other LFW celebrities

London Fashion Week began yesterday and today marks one of the most eventful on the style calendar. Celebrities and fashionistas have stepped out to see the new JW Anderson collection. TV personality and model Alexa Chung was spotted in the FROW alongside other high profile attendees. She sported an all black ensemble, comprised of straight-leg leather jeans, a patent sleeved top with collar and patent black shoes to match.

GETTY London Fashion Week 2017: Alexa Chung was spotted in the FROW of JW Anderson

Alexa wore her brunette locks down in loose waves, with a statement gold necklace to complete the look. She was spotted sitting next to actress and singer Naomi Scott, of Power Ranger fame. Article continues below ADVERTISEMENT Naomi chose a detailed mid-length dress for the fashionable occasion. The multi-textured ensemble featured a full black satin skirt and an orange triangle bralet. She wore buckled black heels and offset her outfit with a soft pink handbag. Article continues below ADVERTISEMENT

GETTY London Fashion Week 2017: Alexa Chung chose an all-black number for the JW Anderson show

GETTY London Fashion Week 2017: Alexa Chung was joined in the JW Anderson FROW by Naomi Scott

The stunning actress wore her short black hair down, complementing her locks with large gold hoop earrings. Article continues below ADVERTISEMENT Northern Irish designer Jonathan Anderson established J.W.Anderson in 2008 and hasn't looked back since. The label is now regarded as one of London’s most innovative and forward thinking brands. It’s not the only show in the spotlight for London Fashion Week.

GETTY London Fashion Week 2017: Actress Naomi scott wore a mid-length dress for the JW Anderson show
